location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Richard Morgan, Secretary to the Marine Board, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, transmits a bill and a receipt for disbursements made on account of the Honourable Company cruiser, the Psyche. Bill and receipt not included.
